data.title: Escuintla Vacation Rentals & Homes - Chiapas, Mexico
data.meta_description: Aug 25, 2024 - Rent from people in Escuintla, Mexico from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Hotel room in Villa Comaltitlán

Master Suit King Gobernador

Suite de gran clase King Size. Tán centrica que lo encontrarás a solo unos pasos del parque central de Villa Comaltitlán. Podemos pasar por ti al aeropuerto de Tapachula las 24 horas del día o simplemente llevarte a descubrir los lugares más mágicos de Chiapas. Disfrutarás de 1 alberca de 2.3 Mts de profundidad, 1 jacuzzi con hidromasaje, 1 restaurante temático, renta de auto por día, viajes turísticos locales, lavandería, hamacas y 2 estacionamientos.

Private room in Tapachula

5 out of 5 average rating, 3 reviews5 (3)

Suite half a block from the sky

Visit us, we look forward to caring and pampering you in this beautiful old coffee farm built with wooden houses and ancient architecture. It is located on the coffee route in Chiapas, located in the mountains, two hours from Tapchula, Chiapas. (It is recommended to ask for an arrival map or hire) our transportation service. Antigua finca cafetelera since 1888 (now hotel). The price is per room c/2 double beds and up to 4 people.

Private room in Villa Comaltitlán

Double double bed

Great class suite with hot water, wifi, climate, smart TVs and 24 hour security. Central tea that you will find a few steps from the central park of Villa Comaltitlán. We can pick you up at Tapachula airport 24 hours a day or simply take you to discover the most magical places in Chiapas. You will enjoy 1 pool of 2.3 meters deep, 1 Jacuzzi with whirlpool, 1 colonial restaurant, hammocks, tourist trips, laundry and 2 parking lots.

Private room in Tapachula de Córdova y Ordoñez

Dreamy honeymoon room for couples

Visit us, we are excited to take care of you and pamper you at this beautiful old cafetelera estate built with wooden houses and old architecture, since 1888 (now hotel). It is located on the cafe route in Chiapas. It is located in the mountain, two hours from Tapchula, Chiapas (It is recommended to ask for an arrival map or hire) our transportation service. The price is per room c/2 double beds and up to 4 people.

Private room in Tapachula de Córdova y Ordoñez

"Half a block from the sky"

Visit us, we are excited to take care of you and pamper you at this beautiful old cafetelera estate built with wooden houses and old architecture, since 1888 (now hotel). It is located on the cafe route in Chiapas. It is located in the mountain, two hours from Tapchula, Chiapas (It is recommended to ask for an arrival map or hire) our transportation service. The price is per room c/2 double beds and up to 4 people.

Villa in Tapachula de Córdova y Ordoñez

La Casa Grande de Aargavia, 1905

Beautiful house dating from 1905 and refurbished in 1999, with precious woods from the same farm, with generous spaces that will allow you to experience the essence of free country life in comfort. The 19th-century coffee lifestyle brought to date. Extensive gardens, abundant water, green on all sides and the intensity of Soconusco on the most diversified farm in the area

Private room in Villa Comaltitlán

GOVERNOR SUITE

Large-class suite with pool , jacuzzi with whirlpool, wifi, air conditioning, parking, hammocks and rustic colonial restaurant. So central that you will find the market just 2 minutes and the central park of Villa Comaltitlán 50 meters. We can stop by for you at Tapachula airport. Experience the full experience with our tourist trips, spa, and romantic dinners.

Private room in Huixtla

Sleeping rooms

The rooms are located in the center of the city, two blocks from the central park, they have new minisplit climate, a double bed, a hammock, a normal sofa, new refrigerator, electric grill, two dining rooms with 4 chairs each, Living room with two armchairs, a bathroom Full bathroom, garage for one car, very safe area, has surveillance at night.
